title: WATCH: First episode of documentary starring UGA QB
text:
WATCH: First episode of documentary starring UGA QB The first episode of the documentary featuring Jake Fromm. Not a member? Try a seven-day FREE trial to VIP access to Dawgs247! 
The first episode of a documentary involving Georgia true freshman quarterback Jake Fromm has been released. 
Fromm, along with Ohio State quarterback Tate Martell and Wake Forest quarterback Tayvon Bowers, are part of go90's QB1: Beyond the Lights , with television series Friday Night Lights creatorPeter Berg serving as the documentaryâ€™s executive producer. Fans can watch the first ten minutes above, then watch the entire show here . 
Fromm enrolled early at Georgia in January and is expected to push rising sophomore, incumbent starter, and former five-star recruit Jacob Eason for playing time. 
(What's next for the Bulldogs? Make sure you're in the loop -- take a few moments to sign up for our FREE Bulldogs Newsletter! ) Author
